description:
If you live in Cumberland County, North Carolina, and you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing, you can turn to the legal professionals at Brent Adams & Associates in Fayetteville for the aggressive advocacy and dedicated support you deserve.

Serving the injured and disabled since our founding in 1973, our law firm has grown to include four total law offices throughout the state, lending testament to the level of success we have achieved helping our plaintiff clients recover the maximum amount of compensation for their damages.

Along with handling all types of personal injury claims, including medical malpractice, defective medication and nursing home abuse claims, we represent injured and disabled workers who are seeking their rightful Social Security Disability or workers' compensation benefits, and we also serve the needs of individuals facing insurmountable debt to help them find the relief they seek.

All of the attorneys at our law firm possess extensive experience in their respective practice areas, and we have received numerous awards and honors for our high ethical standards and exceptional service. This means you can expect to receive the highest level of counsel and support from a local attorney you can trust with your most sensitive legal issues.

For more information on how Brent Adams & Associates can assert your rights to help you secure a brighter future for yourself and your family, you can contact our law office to receive a free evaluation of your case from one of our experienced and dedicated attorneys.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
